text: The 2019 Women's U-19 European Handball Championship was the eleventh edition of the European Women's U-19 Handball Championship, held in Celje, Slovenia from 27 July to 7 August 2017. == Qualification == {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width: 250px;" | Competition ! Dates ! Host ! Vacancies !
